summary: She survived a brutal massacre, but lost her life. What happens to the final girl after the credits roll?
cast: Akasha Villalobos|Danielle Evon Ploeger|Brian Villalobos|Jason Vines|Laura Ray|Ryan Hamilton|Kelsey Pribilski|JD Carrera|Chad Warren|Rodrigo Lloreda|Anny Ibarra|Amanda Phillips|Margaret Garza|Shannon McCormick|Scot Friedman|Federica Rangel|Aaron Walther|Christopher Alvarenga|William John Daley|Edwin Wise|Conrad Gonzales|Aaron D. Alexander|Kevin Machate|Hector Gonzales|Jeffery Da'Shade Johnson|Heather Materne|Adriane Shown
title: Last Girl Standing
